title: Talent Hive
subtitle: Shortlist hundreds of resumes using a powerful AI.
myResponsibilities: Built and deployed the full-stack NLP engine using SpaCy and FastAPI
Integrated resume parsing and scoring pipeline with job descriptions
Developed HR dashboard for job creation, preview, and applicant shortlisting
Created modular candidate application system with auto-parsed resume data
Implemented company-level admin controls and role-based access
methodology: Developed using **Agile** methodology with sprint-based delivery, emphasizing early functional prototypes and continuous user feedback from HR professionals.
about: Talent Hive streamlines the recruitment process by offering a powerful AI-based resume shortlisting engine. It's built for HR managers to easily post jobs, view applicants, and select the most compatible candidates based on extracted and scored resume data.

The platform also offers a frictionless job application experience for candidates. Users can upload their resume and have fields auto-populated by the NLP engine. The parsed output is editable, modular, and personalized for each resume.
Admins can manage HRMs, oversee company data, and ensure role-specific access â€” making Talent Hive ideal for startups and enterprise HR teams alike.

challengesAndLessons.challenge: Designing a resume parsing engine accurate across diverse formats
challengesAndLessons.solution: Used SpaCy with a custom-trained NER model. Introduced preprocessing steps to clean PDF artifacts and built custom scoring logic using cosine similarity.
Made all parsed fields editable and modular. Let users add/delete sections freely, maintaining trust while leveraging automation. Learned the importance of UX in AI-heavy flows.
